mapper.insert: insert into device( departmentCode_t, deviceName_t, deviceIMEI_t) values (#{departmentCode},#{deviceName},#{deviceIMEI})
mapper.select:
select deviceIMEI_t as deviceIMEI, deviceInfo_t as deviceInfo, deviceName_t as deviceName, deviceDefaultPWD_t as deviceDefaultPWD, departmentCode_t as departmentCode from device where 1=1
and deviceName_t like "%"#{deviceName}"%"
and deviceIMEI_t like "%"#{deviceIMEI}"%"
and departmentCode_t =#{departmentCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task ( taskCode_t, proposerCode_t, deviceIMEI_t, taskTime_t, taskStatus_t ) values (#{taskCode}, #{proposerCode}, #{deviceIMEI}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT t.taskStatus_t AS taskStatus, t.taskCode_t AS taskCode, t.deviceIMEI_t AS deviceIMEI, temp.deviceName_t AS deviceName, t.taskTime_t AS taskTime, u.userName_t as userName FROM task AS t JOIN ( SELECT * FROM device WHERE departmentCode_t IN ( SELECT departmentCode_t FROM personnel WHERE userRole_t < 3 AND userCode_t = #{userCode} ) ) AS temp ON temp.deviceIMEI_t = t.deviceIMEI_t AND t.taskStatus_t = #{taskStatus} INNER JOIN user as u ON u.userCode_t = #{userCode}
mapper.update: update task set taskStatus_t =#{taskStatus} where taskCode_t = #{taskCode}
mapper.select: select taskcode_t as taskcode, proposercode_t as proposercode, deviceimei_t as deviceimei, tasktime_t as tasktime, taskstatus_t as taskstatus from task where taskCode_t = #{taskCode}
mapper.update: update task set taskStatus_t = #{taskStatus} where taskCode_t = #{taskCode}
mapper.insert: insert into record(taskCode_t, doTime_t, proposeCode_t, deviceIMEI_t, recordType_t) values (#{taskCode}, #{doTime},#{proposeCode}, #{deviceIMEI}, #{recordType})
mapper.select: select taskCode_t as taskCode, doTime_t as doTime, proposeCode_t as proposeCode, deviceIMEI_t as deviceIMEI, recordType_t as recordType from record where proposeCode_t = #{proposeCode} order by doTime_t desc
